WorkItem.ClosedComment: This doesn't really work in a C project, either - there's no "compile on save" feature. You'll need to configure the build action yourself in this case. We'll be iterating heavily on the project system in Visual Studio in future releases - stay tuned.
WorkItem.Description:
It is currently not possible to add typescript files to a Visual Basic project.

If you do this via File > New > Typescript file (under C), no JS file is automatically created when you save changes to your TS file.

In a C project this works.
